title: Air Quality
text:
Air Purifier
We create a TuyaAirPurifier that we can use to turn on and off the air purifier.


TuyaAirPurifier

 TuyaAirPurifier (device_id:str, client_id:str, client_secret:str,
                  country_code:str, username:str, password:str,
                  endpoint:str='https://openapi.tuyaus.com',
                  appschema:str='smartLife')

Purifiers controlled by a Tuya Smart Switch



AirPurifier

 AirPurifier ()

Air Purifiers purify the air and protect the home from pollution.



Device

 Device ()

Generic class that encapsulates all smart home devices

title: Air Quality
text:
Air Quality Source
We fetch air quality data for the nearest location from the aqicn.org API.


AirQualityAPIClient

 AirQualityAPIClient (token:str)

Air Quality Index API Client
Documentation

title: Air Quality
text:
Dagster Job
We create a dagster job that performs the automation.


current_aqi

 current_aqi (context)

Fetch the current AQI from AQICN.org



air_purifier_control

 air_purifier_control (context, current_aqi, threshold=50)

If the current AQI exceeds the defined threshold, we turn on the air purifier. Otherwise, we turn it off.










Type
Default
Details




context





current_aqi


Current AQI reading


threshold
int
50
AQI Threshold above which to turn on air purifier


Returns
None








regulate_air_quality

 regulate_air_quality ()

Dagster Job regulates air quality

title: tjhome
text:
This is the central Dagster Repository that stores all the jobs, ready to be imported by a Dagster installation.






 tjhome ()
